long_description: The 7 in. Metolius Bravo quickdraw set blends light weight with high strength to help you complete your climbing projects. Featherweight Bravo wiregate carabiners on each end are joined by an 11mm-wide Dyneema Monster sling. Weighing in at 30g (1.06 oz.) each, the Bravo carabiners keep the overall weight of the quickdraw down to only 71g (2.5 oz.). Rubber JIG(TM) on 1 end keeps the 'biner properly oriented for easy, efficient clipping of the rope.
short_description: The 7 in. Metolius Bravo quickdraw set blends light weight with high strength to help you complete your climbing projects.
